name: Holy Roller
description:
Hey there! Me and a few other people on the GMTK server thought of this game as a joke. So I decided to make it because I had nothing better to do. Welp.

Roll a random number from 1 to 1000. Roll a 1000 to win. There are 1000 achievements. Get all of them for 100% completion. Speed run the game and try to beat your friends.

May RNGesus be in your favor.
